experience.title: Data Analyst (Engineering Associate)
experience.description: • Converted large and complex data sets into actionable insights using PostgreSQL, Python, MS Excel, Amazon Redshift, and Redash for data intelligence and analysis.• Designed and delivered data visualizations/ dashboards using Apache Superset, Google Looker Studio, Tableau, and other visualization toolsets to communicate insights to stakeholders and support decision making.• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify business requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.• Organize, extrapolate, and disseminate data across departments to conclude the success of the current method• Continuously monitored data quality and provided recommendations for improvements.• Streamlined data processes and improved efficiency by automating manual reporting tasks using Redash and Google App Scripts.
experience.description_html: • Converted large and complex data sets into actionable insights using PostgreSQL, Python, MS Excel, Amazon Redshift, and Redash for data intelligence and analysis.• Designed and delivered data visualizations/ dashboards using Apache Superset, Google Looker Studio, Tableau, and other visualization toolsets to communicate insights to stakeholders and support decision making.• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify business requirements and deliver data-driven solutions.• Organize, extrapolate, and disseminate data across departments to conclude the success of the current method• Continuously monitored data quality and provided recommendations for improvements.• Streamlined data processes and improved efficiency by automating manual reporting tasks using Redash and Google App Scripts.

projects: [{"title":"Python Sales Analysis","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Analyzed the raw data and extracted information from it,can be used to make future decisions.Evaluated the sales by using Exploratory Data Analysis,Statistics, Data Visualizations in Python.Analyzed the dataset by multiple features to find the mostprofitable month for sales, the most profitable category,product demand by city, most popular products, most sold-together products."},{"title":"Sales Shipping Dashboard","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Created an interactive Dashboard in MS Excel using PowerQuery, Pivot Table, Graphs, and Slicer.Goal was to analyze the influence of sales of differentproduct categories at different locations.Used dashboard for multivariate analysis in real-time datato have a better understanding of data."},{"title":"Superstore Dashboard","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Generated advanced strategy Tableau dashboards withquick/context/global filters, parameters, Level of Detailexpressions and calculated fields using the SuperstoreDataset for better analysis."},{"title":"Titanic Survival Prediction","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"Tested different Machine Learning models to test thesurvival chances based on data features.Used Logistic regression, K-Nearest Neighbour, Decisiontree etc. as the evaluation parameters.Investigated the accuracy of random forest using k-foldcross validation and out of bag score."}]
